metadata.title: CVE-2016-3674 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Multiple XML external entity (XXE) vulnerabilities in the (1) Dom4JDriver, (2) DomDriver, (3) JDomDriver, (4) JDom2Driver, (5) SjsxpDriver, (6) StandardStaxDriver, and (7) WstxDriver drivers in XStream before 1.4.9 allow remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a crafted XML document.

criterions.comment: libxstream-java package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.9-1').
